ValidationRule.description: Users Cannot Make Changes to Opportunity.Selected Payment Type
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Selected_Payment_Type__c), NOT(ISNEW()), PRIORVALUE(Selected_Payment_Type__c) <> NULL, $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Users cannot make changes to the Opportunity.Selected Payment Type field. Changes can only be made on the CPQ Quote and propagated up onto the Opportunity
